summary: Highly skilled Frontend Engineer with 15+ years of experience in developing and implementing user- friendly and visually appealing web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern JS frameworks such as React, Next, Angular, and others. On top of that also well-versed in software testing philospohy and framework like Jest, Cypress, Playwright.
